amendment.description: Amendment prohibits members of the armed forces from being forced to wear any United Nations insignia unless specifically authorized by Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit United States military personnel from being forced to wear the uniform or any visible insignia of the United Nations unless specifically authorized by Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bartlett amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 276 - 130 (Roll no. 404).
